Text:
I have limited bandwidth (which I have to share with other people). So I'm initially seeding for 10 peers (otherwise it would take like forever for all of you to complete the download).

Once those 10 peers have their download complete, I hope them to seed for the rest of you who are waiting (I'll seed, too). I guess some people who are downloading do have more upload bandwidth than me.

Sorry for the inconvenience.

The upload to the initial seeders is finally complete :)

Keep seeding, please.
i sure will keep seeding - This torrent is just great
